choices.D: It can run on any platform that has a Java compiler.
choices.C: It can run on any platform that has the Java Runtime Environment.
choices.E: It can run on any platform only if that platform has both the Java Runtime Environment and a Java compiler.
choices.A: It can run on any platform.
choices.B: It can run on any platform only if it was compiled for that platform.
